page.title: 05Tachikara, Wombourne
page.content: For the last 12 years there has been an international volleyball tournament at Ounsdale High School in Wombourne. Its name is Tachikara, the name coming from the Japanese sponsor of some of the early competitions. It takes place at Whitsun, the last week in May. The Ounsdale sports field is turned into 30 volleyball courts. More than 80 teams, men,women,boys and girls travel from all over Britain.This year teams were entered from Holland and Kuwait. Part of the sports field becomes a tented village for the teams arrive in campers and caravans or with tents. The classrooms of the school are sometimes used as dormitories. There are 10 separate competitions. The 1000+ visitors have special events organised for them at night as well.
